description.component: Text card component and pattern with content.

card_border.name: Card Border
card_border.description: Add a default border to the card.

padded.name: Padded
padded.description: Add a default padding to the card.

card_text_utility_classes.name: Utility Classes
card_text_utility_classes.description: Use to add extra Bootstrap utility classes for the main Card wrapper. E.g. `mb-3 shadow-lg` ( Do not add card)

card_text_content_utility_classes.name: Content Utility Classes
card_text_content_utility_classes.description: Use to add extra Bootstrap utility classes for the Card Content region wrapper. E.g. `w-75 mb-3 overflow-y-hidden`  ( Do not add card-body)

card_attributes.name: Card Attributes
card_attributes.description: HTML attributes for the Card element.

content_attributes.name: Content Attributes
content_attributes.description: HTML attributes for the content element.
